django.utils.inspect
====================

.. py:module:: django.utils.inspect


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.utils.inspect.get_func_args
   django.utils.inspect.get_func_full_args
   django.utils.inspect.func_accepts_kwargs
   django.utils.inspect.func_accepts_var_args
   django.utils.inspect.method_has_no_args
   django.utils.inspect.func_supports_parameter


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: get_func_args(func)

.. py:function:: get_func_full_args(func)

   Return a list of (argument name, default value) tuples. If the argument
   does not have a default value, omit it in the tuple. Arguments such as
   *args and **kwargs are also included.


.. py:function:: func_accepts_kwargs(func)

   Return True if function 'func' accepts keyword arguments **kwargs.


.. py:function:: func_accepts_var_args(func)

   Return True if function 'func' accepts positional arguments *args.


.. py:function:: method_has_no_args(meth)

   Return True if a method only accepts 'self'.


.. py:function:: func_supports_parameter(func, name)
